name: Amazon Shopping
description: Search and browse Amazon products via Canopy API. Get product details, pricing, and reviews.

credentials.name: canopy_api_key
credentials.label: Canopy API Key
credentials.description: API key from canopyapi.co (100 free requests/month, then $0.01/req)

functions.name: amazon_search
functions.description: Search Amazon for products. Returns product listings with titles, prices, ratings, and ASINs.

domain.description: Amazon domain (e.g. amazon.com, amazon.co.uk, amazon.de). Defaults to US.

sort.description: Sort order: FEATURED, MOST_RECENT, PRICE_ASCENDING, PRICE_DESCENDING, AVERAGE_CUSTOMER_REVIEW

functions.name: amazon_product_details
functions.description: Get detailed information about a specific Amazon product by ASIN, URL, or product code (ISBN/UPC/EAN).

functions.name: amazon_product_reviews
functions.description: Get top customer reviews for a product.
